title: Change Monthly Billing Date
description: A customer wants to change their monthly payment due date from the 1st to the 15th of the month.

tasks.description: Identify the customer and their current billing setup.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the customer's policy and current due date.

tasks.description: Explain how changing the date will affect their next payment (prorated amount).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly explains the one-time effect on the next bill.

tasks.description: Update the billing system with the new preferred payment date.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully changes the due date in the system.
